sourcesContent:
import React, { FC } from 'react'; const Terms: FC = () => (

Terms and Conditions

Welcome to VoiceCapsule!

These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of VoiceCapsule's mobile application and website, located at www.voicecapsule.com.

1. Acceptance of Terms

By downloading, installing, or using the VoiceCapsule app and accessing our website, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provisions of this agreement.

2. Use of the Service

VoiceCapsule is a voice journaling app that allows users to record, store, and analyze their spoken thoughts and emotions. You agree to use this service only for lawful purposes and in a way that does not infringe the rights of, restrict, or inhibit anyone else's use and enjoyment of the service.

3. Privacy and Data Protection

Your privacy is important to us. Our use of your personal information is governed by our Privacy Policy, which is incorporated into these Terms and Conditions. By using VoiceCapsule, you consent to the collection, use, and sharing of your information as described in our Privacy Policy.

4. User Content

You retain all rights to the content you create and store within VoiceCapsule. However, by using our service, you grant VoiceCapsule a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use, store, and analyze your content for the purpose of providing and improving our services.

5. Prohibited Activities

You agree not to engage in any of the following activities: (1) using the service for any unlawful purpose, (2) attempting to gain unauthorized access to any part of our systems, (3) interfering with or disrupting the integrity or performance of the service, (4) harassing, abusing, or threatening other users, or (5) impersonating any person or entity.

6. Termination

We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your account and access to VoiceCapsule at our sole discretion, without notice, for conduct that we believe violates these Terms and Conditions or is harmful to other users, us, or third parties, or for any other reason.

7. Changes to Terms

We reserve the right to modify these Terms and Conditions at any time. We will notify users of any significant changes. Your continued use of VoiceCapsule after such modifications constitutes your acceptance of the updated terms.

8. Contact Us

If you have any questions about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us at legal@voicecapsule.com.

); export default Terms;
